data.name: Wolverine
data.description: A mutant armed with adamantium claws that ignore armor and tear through his opponents.

starItems.name: Wolverine
starItems.description: A mutant armed with adamantium claws that ignore armor and tear through his opponents.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Crit.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Crit.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Crit.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> on Crit.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>230%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to primary target.

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted </color>to primary target.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color> targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> enemies

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>2</color>-<color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing to primary target
Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> enemies

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> enemies

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color> targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing secondary targets
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> enemies

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>3</color>-<color=#86e619>4</color> targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing to primary target
Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> enemies
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>400%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

Rebound Chain to <color=#86e619>5</color> targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Crit Chance on each secondary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

2.description:
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>440%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

3.description:
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>530%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

5.description:
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>620%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>710%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

7.description:
If this character's Health is below <color=#86e619>50%</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>800%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If Omega Red, Colossus, or Sasquatch is an ally:
 > Always gain <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from the primary target.

On Kill, repeat this attack targeting the most injured enemy.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

While this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Block Chance.

On Death, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>10%</color> of this character's Max Health.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Max Health on Revive
Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally

2.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

While this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Block Chance.

On Death, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally. This is applied after any character has taken an action.
2.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on enemy Death, prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>+1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

3.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

While this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Block Chance.

On Death, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, on enemy Death, prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>+1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, while this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Resistance

4.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

While this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Block Chance.

On Death, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Resistance.
 > On enemy Death, prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>+1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
When this character drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, if this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies, enemy characters cannot gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>

5.description:
On Turn, Heal for <color=#86e619>20%</color> of this character's Max Health.

When this character drops below <color=#86e619>60%</color> Health, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> and <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

While this character is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Health, gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Block Chance.

On Death, <color=#86e619>25%</color> chance to Revive with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Speed per <color=#fff568>UNCANNY</color> <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> or <color=#fff568>WEAPON X</color> ally. This is applied after any character has taken an action.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> and on <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>:
 > While this character has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> and does not have <color=#fff568>Exhausted</color>, this character and all <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies, gain +<color=#86e619>200%</color> Resistance.
 > On enemy Death, prolong the duration of all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Trauma</color>, <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, and <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, on all enemies by <color=#86e619>+1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.
 > If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>ALPHA FLIGHT</color> allies, enemy characters cannot gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
